attributes.title: Scam story ✨🧚
attributes.review: I downloaded this app 2 days ago and it asked me for my credit card information! I thought it was to donate like $5 to the campaign, but instead it made me buy big 12inch blue and purple marbles DILDO! Apparently it’s supposed to be a replica of our presidents junk (we all know that’s not true after seeing that tanning picture of him. We all know melania just in it for the money now!!!!) Anyways if you don’t want a huge ass dildo sent to your house then don’t get this app😤
